meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Bernadette Nguyen Dave Leffler Elizabeth Goss Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7876.

td.p: Bernadette Nguyen, an attorney from Mechanicsville, Maryland
Dave Leffler, a retired police officer from Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania
Elizabeth Goss, a housewife from Pleasant Ridge, Michigan (whose 1-day cash winnings total $4,799)

tr.td: BROTHERS GRIMM FAIRY TALES
COOKERS
THEIR TRIBUTE BAND
A FISHY SITUATION
"MIRA", MIRA
ON THE WALL
